body: New Debian stable came out this summer, so let's use that. Better yet, the `slim` version with manpages and other things removed. Also, didn't realize it was still pulling `irungentoo/toxcore`, I guess it wasn't updated since TokTok fork. --- This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/637)

Actually, let me make it a bit more readable with 1 change.
There. Now to wait on Travis for 1 more hour.
